attributes.action: Suspend Brunei from the British Commonwealth until they rescind anti-gay laws
attributes.additional_details: South Africa was suspended from the Commonwealth due to its policy of apartheid. This is as bad, if not worse than that
attributes.background: The Sultan of Brunei is introducing new laws that gay people can be killed by stoning or whipping, just for being gay. This barbaric state-sponsored policy belongs in the history books. This has no place in the 21st century and certainly no place in the British Commonwealth.
